item.title: How to start an online server
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

[quote=“Cyp_import10, post:3, topic:155595”]1. you will need a no-ip adress…go to www.no-ip.biz or no-ip.com i dont remember.
2. make an account…
3. get your server name.
4.check that you have port forwarded.
5.press run in your server folder.
6.you should be done.[/quote]

www.no-ip.com.

  1. www.no-ip.com
  2. Make an account with No-Ip
  3. Think of a name for your servers’ IP. (myservername.no-ip.biz/org/myservername.servergame.com) etc etc.
  4. Download No-Ip DUC.
  5. Make sure you have port forwarded.
  6. Open the server files, find “Run.bat” and run it.
  7. Should all be done.
  8. Any more problems that you should have; reply to this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: How to start an online server
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

  1. Open your server.
  2. Go to the desktop.
  3. Press ALT+F4 and shutdown your PC. (Don’t worry, your server is still running on your IP).
  4. Unplug it at the wall, and don’t plug it back in.
  5. Press the power button to turn your PC back on.
  6. Wait a few mins. (It will take a couple of mins to start back up with no power cord).
  7. Once it’s restarted, plug back in the cord, and everything will be working. Yourserver will now be online.

Read full topic
item.source: How to start an online server
